name: inrot
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))

stmt.origin: eqtri(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1), cin(cin(c2, c1), c0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c1), c0))
-| wceq(cin(cin(c2, c1), c0), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c1), c0))
-| wceq(cin(cin(c2, c1), c0), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))

body.origin: |- wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c1), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cin(cin(c2, c1), c0), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))

body.origin: |- wceq(cin(cin(c2, c1), c0), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin: |- wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cin(c2, c0), c1))

comment: Rotate the intersection of 3 classes. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2012.)
